Name: Tortuga
About the game: Have you heard of Tortuga? A beautiful island in the Caribbean occupied by French and English pirates in the 1600s. With one life to live, emerge yourself in finding and collecting this island's treasure and exploring all of its secrets. Thread very carefully for a huge amount of poison goo engulfs the island around all its corners. The goal is is to explore the island and collect all the fruits without dying. You have to be perfect and it' nearly impossible. You have to be precise and it's really difficult. You have to have a lot of patience and it's demanding. But you definitely have to work hard. So it's very similar to life, you only live once, and you have to make it count. Tips on living a successful life - Precision Matters - Be Patient and careful at all time - Be creative, Find your own paths - Do not enter any door unless you have the required amount of treasure GOOD LUCK
